fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to attack a player at night. If you successfully kill them, instead of dying, the target will be converted into a Farmer (3936). This is not public. If the target is immune to conversion, they will still be dealt a basic attack. You can only attack once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player rolls Lord and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader. Unique role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: The Lord has converted you into a Farmer!
